verbs.description: [ARG0: Hollywood star Rob Lowe] [V: congratulated] [ARG1: Roseanne Barr] [ARG2: on the explosive success of the revival of her hit show] , and then explained in one tweet why it was so successful . Here 's what he said https://twitter.com/RobLowe/status/979783951068774401 " The secret to [ Roseanne Barr 's ] massive ratings is that it celebrates people with huge political differences who are able to laugh and love together as they passionately disagree . " Lowe 's observation was in contrast with some who were characterizing the show as simply pro - Trump , including President Trump himself , who appeared to take credit for the high ratings before an audience in Ohio . " [ARGM-DIS: Exactly] , " responded Mark Hemingway of the Weekly Standard . " The issue is n't that the show caters to conservatives . It just gives them a seat at the table rather than pretending half of America is backwards or does n't exist . " Lowe retweeted a response to his observation with a quote incorrectly attributed to Aristotle . " It is the mark of an educated …

[ARG0: Hollywood star Rob Lowe] congratulated Roseanne Barr on the explosive success of the revival of her hit show , and [ARGM-TMP: then] [V: explained] [ARGM-LOC: in one tweet] [ARG1: why it was so successful . Here 's what he said https://twitter.com/RobLowe/status/979783951068774401 " The secret to [ Roseanne Barr 's ] massive ratings is that it celebrates people with huge political differences who are able to laugh and love together as they passionately disagree] . " Lowe 's observation was in contrast with some who were characterizing the show as simply pro - Trump , including President Trump himself , who appeared to take credit for the high ratings before an audience in Ohio . " Exactly , " responded Mark Hemingway of the Weekly Standard . " The issue is n't that the show caters to conservatives . It just gives them a seat at the table rather than pretending half of America is backwards or does n't exist . " Lowe retweeted a response to his observation with a quote incorrectly attributed to Aristotle . " It is the mark of an educated …

Hollywood star Rob Lowe congratulated Roseanne Barr on the explosive success of the revival of her hit show , and then explained in one tweet [ARGM-CAU: why] [ARG1: it] [V: was] [ARG2: so successful] . Here 's what he said https://twitter.com/RobLowe/status/979783951068774401 " The secret to [ Roseanne Barr 's ] massive ratings is that it celebrates people with huge political differences who are able to laugh and love together as they passionately disagree . " Lowe 's observation was in contrast with some who were characterizing the show as simply pro - Trump , including President Trump himself , who appeared to take credit for the high ratings before an audience in Ohio . " Exactly , " responded Mark Hemingway of the Weekly Standard . " The issue is n't that the show caters to conservatives . It just gives them a seat at the table rather than pretending half of America is backwards or does n't exist . " Lowe retweeted a response to his observation with a quote incorrectly attributed to Aristotle . " It is the mark of an educated …
